welcomeDesc: Grand play2earn strategy game of territorial conquest.
noUnits:
You don't have any units.
Build Barracks to start recruitin units.
timber campDesc: The Timber Camp is a key component to your village's growth. Wood is used to construct buildings and training units. The higher the level of the Timber Camp, the more wood it produces per hour.
stone quarryDesc: The Stone Quarry is a key component to your village's growth. Stone is used to construct buildings and training units. The higher the level of the Stone Quarry, the more stone it produces per hour.
iron mineDesc: The Iron Mine is a key component to your village's growth. Iron is used to construct buildings and training units. The higher the level of the Iron Mine, the more iron it produces per hour.
confirmTxDesc: Please sign the transaction to start farming resources
txFailed: Something went wrong, transaction failed, try later
